ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Suukie continued shooting at something, it was something at least, he didn t realize he wasn t even shooting at a Predacon.....just off into the distance..he

Suukie continued shooting at something, it was something at least, he didn't
realize he wasn't even shooting at a Predacon.....just off into the
distance..he started to scream in frustration, not realizing that the battle
was over........he fell to the ground, because he thought to be hit with a
laser shot.......he crwled back toward the Maximal base...he started to slam
his head against the wall......Plintissa looked at him. "Suukie, what are
you doing?..." she asked..... "i am not Suukie anymore!..." he yelled.....
"i know!..." said Plintissa, she opened fire upon Suukie and blasted him to
multiple pieces..... "think twice before attacking me next time,
Artist!...." she said to Suukie......she gathered up his parts and walked
back into the base......
----- Original Message -----
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, May 06, 2000 3:00 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
> * Iron Raptor nodded at Prowls suggestion as she bent over and picked up a
> particularly large missile launcher, she was thinking of an attack but not
> carrying it out at the moment.
> She looked at Prowl...*
>
> " We are going to let them do so, Prowl. We are damaged as well as our
base
> and require repairs, this would be a nice time to do that."
>
> * She looked over at the damaged island controls and sighed...*
>
> " But you all fought well and deserve a few mega-cycles in the CR
chambers,
> despite the outcome of this battle. Believe it or not...I'm rather proud
of
> you all."
>
> * Iron Raptor then looked back to Prowl, a tired smile on her face...*
>
> " But after you repair please return here and pick up a weapon for
yourself,
> I will be speaking to the remainder of the Maximals as well after their
> repairs."
>
> * She then turned to Teltoli, she looked the fuzor over but then
nodded...*
>
> " As I can see, you have found the weapons hold. Good, you have done well.
> And it's obviousy that I haven't told you my name yet...it's  Iron Raptor.
> And I'm glad to have you as a member of the Maximal force.
> If you have any questions or something like that feel free to ask me and
if
> I'm not available then you can ask another.
> But for now, if you're damaged then simply follow Prowl to the CR
chambers.
> After your repair is complete please return here, there will be a short
> meeting.*
>
> * Iron Raptor then turned towards the controls again and set the missile
> launched on the pile of weapons on the floor, it could be used in better
> hands then her own. She looked forward to working with the new bots about
> but it was still going to be difficult at times.
> She opened her com-link to an all Maximal frequency, it was time to bring
> every bot in for a well deserved rest and repair...*
>
> " Attention, all Maximal forces. If you are not already on your way in I
> suggest that you begin making your way towards that goal, you've all
fought
> well and deserve a good repair and rest. After you have recovered may you
> please make your way to the bridge for a short meeting. Thank you."
>
> * Now it was up to them and her now, the base and it's bots needed a good
> repair and so did she. But her own repairs weren't that important right
now,
> besides, all she would be doing is taking up a chamber that a more wounded
> soldier would need.
> Iron Raptor sighed as she began to slowly fork on the damage, she wasn't a
> bot that was ever trained to do heavy repairs but she knew a little.
> She continued to work carefully and slowly as to make no mistakes, she was
> waiting until the remainder of the Maximals recovered and reloaded.
> Then she would have a little...chat with them.*
>
